attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is precious little conclusive and coherent evidence to support these theories. Little weight is given to theories put forward by other academics. see : http://www.junkscience.com/july04/Daily_Mail-Bellamy.htm

by Professor David Bellamy.

How can a government form policy based on what is at best theory.

rejection.details:
There is already a very similar petition:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cchonesty/
If you wish to have your own petition on the subject, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
